Html:
There are some bugs in this area and if they were fixed I think the current code would be pretty usable.  

Whenever I click "Edit User" in the hopes of changing the Admin password I get this:

Exception Details: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.


Source Error: 

Line 2:  <%@ Import Namespace="Oxite.Modules.Membership.Extensions"%>
Line 3:  <%@ Import Namespace="Oxite.Extensions" %><%
Line 4:      if (Model.GetUser().IsAuthenticated)
Line 5:      { %>
Line 6:  <%=string.Format(Model.Localize("WelcomeUserMessageFormat", "Welcome, {0}!"), string.Format("<span class=\"username\">{0}</span>", Html.Encode(Model.GetUser().DisplayName))) %>


Source File: c:\inetpub\wwwroot\OxiteDev\Views\Shared\LoginUserControl.ascx    Line: 4

 

Otherwise it looks really good
Thanks!  You'll be pleased to know that user management is our next feature we're working on stabilizing.  :)
